text: 6|159|evarkal tankal markkattai (tankal istappati palavaraka)p pirittu (avarkalum) pala pirivinarakap pirintu vittanaro avarkalutan unkalukku oru campantamum illai. Avarkalutaiya visayamellam allahvitame irukkiratu. Avarkal ceytu kontirunta (ittiya)varraip parri pinnar avan avarkalukku arivittuvituvan
